column5: I didn't read the other posts, sorry if someone else has said this already...  NEXT TIME THE ISLAND IS ON FIRE, PUT DOWN THE @#$#ING CAMERA AND HELP!!!   Great stuff TJ
Awesome stuff, looks like a wild trip!

So let me get this straight. Your buds are putting life and limb on the line to put out a forest fire and you're doing you best imitation of cub reporter Jimmy Olsen of the Cobourg Planet?  Looks like my kinda mission.

Dang boss thats a reprot and looks like some fun and laughs its very nice to see that you all helped them your guns out I hope they did learn as for teh trucks you can keep getting  bigger but so do the holes.
Great trip TJ! I wasn't too far from you. 15 miles north east.
Geeeez.  Kids out wrecking their adult expensive toys all in the name of fish, competetion and commraderie...................... Some things never grow old.  Fun stuff TJ.
Let's see:  - Fire? - Wrecked Trucks? - Booze? - Half naked men around a campfire?  and  - TJ?  I wanna know the real story!

Ron:  we blew in and outta town so fast....  lol..  and by monday i was pretty "popped" out.....   I dunno abou the CRV... its a little low I think.. and I made it through the whole weekend without smooching anyone who didnt want to be smooched...  bedside's they would have kicked my butt.     To be hoinest.. I just had to go.. I just couldnt sit around and wait to see what if anything wa going on... another 1/2 an ahour and there wouldnt have been anything left of the place.    Roy... we had three buckets and 8 people.. i decided to be the documentarian!!!  Plus I had clean pants on....    Ahhh  Marty  the rule is... what happens at camp... stays at camp....
Great report TJ, well worth waiting for the pics to download  Maureen
Looks like a great trip! great report and pics!
Can life get any better??? I think not.
Great spot for a good bender TJ! The ride in/out is as much fun as the rest of the weekend!!  A little hard on equipment though huh...LOL.  Thanks for the report!  Sinker
nice report.ive always wanted to try the ham but judgeing by all the boats there and the treacherous drive in i think ill pass.
wow how crazy is that fire!  Good report!  Looks liek lots of fun!  Cheers!
I forgot I took this video....  <object width="425" height="350"> <param name="movie" value="
Definitely a long way for you to go, but it looked like you boys had a blast!
